product_name: MaybellineLifter Liner Lip Liner with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryMaybelline's Lifter Liner Lip Liner with Hyaluronic Acid is made with creamy-feel pigments to sculpt lip lines with easy-on, blendable color. Available in multiple shades.
details: DetailsFeaturesDelivers a smooth glide & comfortable feelFormulated with hyaluronic acid & jojoba oilAvailable in multiple modern shades including nudes from light beige to rich brown & everything in betweenItem 2624879IngredientsLet's Bounce: Isododecane, Synthetic Wax, Polybutene, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Sucrose Tetrastearate Triacetate, Isoamyl Laurate, Silica, Hydrogenated Jojoba Oil, Cetearyl Behenate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Kaolin, Trihydroxystearin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Colophonium/Rosin/Colophane.California Prop65 WarningWARNING: This product can expose you to chemicals which are known to the state of California to cause cancerLearn more at www.P65Warnings.ca.gov

reviews.headline: Unable to sharpen
reviews.comments: It's a great product until I try to sharpen it. The tip just breaks. After my first attempt to sharpen I'm already halfway thru the pencil

reviews.headline: It's perfect
reviews.comments: The color, the texture, the staying power- it's all perfect. I don't know if I'll buy another brand again.

reviews.headline: Lip liner
reviews.comments: Its decent drug store priced lip liner. The swatches in the photos are not accurate of the actual color and fhe packaging is misleading too. I got line leader for a rosy nude and it is brown. Not the color i wanted and most of the all pull brownish or orsnge on me.

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I really liked this liner, it lasts for a long time on the lips but when i try to sharpen it the sharpeners just destroy it and when i do finally get a usable tip to it it just falls off. My first time sharpening it and its half down and still not usable. I dont have this problem with any other liner i have. I dont know what im doing wrong with it.

reviews.headline: I keep a stock on these
reviews.comments: Highly pigmented and last all day, also brown girl friendly as I pair it up with rare beauty lip stain in the shade Hope

reviews.headline: Does not last
reviews.comments: I love this liner color "on it" but it does not last for more than 30 minutes.

reviews.headline: High quality product!
reviews.comments: The creaminess, pigment and ease of blending with this product rivals a high end product. I was so impressed with it the first time I used it. Even more impressive is that I am still in awe of the quality each time I continue to use it. The fact that I can purchase such a high quality product at a drugstore price is incredible. I cannot recommend this enough.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: I like this lip liner, however its not as dark as i thought it was. I saw a review/ad on tiktok as the lady using it was darker skinned, but for me it came out a little lighter as well as a weird orange undertone. But apart from that I absolutely adore the formula and the way or feels when being applied.

reviews.headline: Nice liner
reviews.comments: Lovely liner, goes on easy, doesnt bleed or sink into the lines around my mouth. Glides on nicely, stays put even with a lip balm topper.  Let's Bounce is sicu a great color !

reviews.headline: never discontinue this.
reviews.comments: this is the best drugstore lipliner ive ever purchased, lasts all day which is really rare for a drugstore lipliner to do. please never discontinue this.

reviews.headline: Would repurchase üòç!!
reviews.comments: It does not move AT ALL. Lasts better than alot of high-end lip liners. Shades are really nice and it's affordable

reviews.headline: SO GOOD
reviews.comments: it lastes so long and so creamy!

reviews.headline: Super
reviews.comments: I was so confused because the case is plasticy, but you sharpen it like a normal pencil. Just FYI lol

reviews.headline: Out of Line
reviews.comments: Wore this lip liner last night during an eight hour shift and gotta say its worth the hype. These lip liners are better than some of the higher end stuff. Not once did the liner seep into my 30 something year old fine lines (I have dry sensitive skin) and held my lips stick beautifully. Truly impressed and will buy more!

reviews.headline: Best drugstore product
reviews.comments: I love this so much more than all of my more expensive liners. Colors are great, glides in nicely and inexpensive.

reviews.headline: Best Lip Liner!
reviews.comments: I usually dont write reviews but this lip liner was so good that I had to. I dont wear a whole lot of lip liners because I am picky about them. However, I decided to try this and I was amazed! It glides on so smoothly and it is long lasting. I also like how it is shaped like a pencil but doesn't feel like one because of the creamy formula. Definitely recommend buying this!

reviews.headline: My Favorite lip liner
reviews.comments: it's so good you don't have to apply much pressure when putting it on it glides on easy

reviews.headline: Great pencil
reviews.comments: Long lasting, beautiful shades

reviews.headline: Creamy but lasts a long time
reviews.comments: I bought 3 as they were part of a promotion but then I went back to buy a 4th color. It was recommended by a few makeup artists I follow on youtube.

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: Got the colors Peeking and Lets Bounce on it, love how they glide on the lips and how long lasting they are! Only downside for me is sharpening them can be annoying for some reason.

faceoff_positive.comments:
**Maybelline Lifter Lip Liner Review: A Game-Changing Lip Liner that Lifts and Defines**

As a makeup enthusiast, I'm always on the lookout for products that can help me achieve a flawless, polished look. Maybelline's Lifter Lip Liner has been a game-changer for me, and I'm excited to share my thoughts on this innovative lip liner.

**Packaging:**
The Lifter Lip Liner comes in a sleek, compact case that's easy to twist up and down. The liner itself has a soft, flexible tip that makes it easy to apply a precise line.

**Formula:**
The formula is what sets this lip liner apart from others. It's infused with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E, which work together to provide long-lasting hydration and nourishment to the lips. The formula is also lightweight and non-greasy, making it perfect for daily use.

**Lifting Effect:**
The real magic of this lip liner lies in its ability to lift and define the lips. The formula contains a unique blend of peptides that help to stimulate collagen production, which can lead to a more plump and youthful appearance. After applying the liner, I noticed that my lips looked more defined and lifted, with a subtle increase in volume.

**Color Selection:**
The Lifter Lip Liner comes in a range of shades to suit different skin tones and personal preferences. I opted for the "Pink" shade, which provides a subtle wash of color that adds warmth and dimension to the lips.

**Ease of Use:**
The lip liner is easy to apply and blend, making it perfect for those who are new to lip liner or want a quick and easy way to define their lips. The formula is also buildable, allowing you to customize the level of color and definition to your liking.

**Long-Lasting:**
One of the things that impressed me most about the Lifter Lip Liner is its long-lasting wear. After applying the liner, I found that it remained in place for several hours, even after eating and drinking. The color faded slightly over time, but still looked great.

**Overall Experience:**
Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed with Maybelline's Lifter Lip Liner. It's a game-changing product that delivers on its promises of hydration, definition, and lifting. The formula is lightweight, non-greasy, and easy to apply, making it perfect for daily use. Whether you're looking for a lip liner that can provide long-lasting hydration or a subtle boost of plumpness, the Lifter Lip Liner is definitely worth considering.

**Rating:** 4.5/5 stars

**Recommendation:** If you're looking for a lip liner that can deliver on its promises of hydration and lifting, look no further than Maybelline's Lifter Lip Liner. It's a must-have product for anyone who wants to add definition and dimension to their lips!
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it

faceoff_negative.comments: I LOVED this at first. everything  was a  chefs kiss. the color was gorgeous, it was smooth, lasted a long time. but then i realized it made my lips chapped N red. the whole day they were burning. idk why this happened to me, no one else in the reviews seems to have this problem. its so sad tho bc i was so excited to use it!! when i wore it, i used my elf lip oil on top of it, but now when i use my lip oil, i also get chapped lips since i layered it with the lip liner. idk if that makes sense but its a bummer.
faceoff_negative.headline: beautiful at first! then made my lips chapped
